title: Windows XP SP3 Integrated Dec 2013
description:
Build from Original untouched image of Windows XP SP3

 - Contains all major updates after SP3 till December 2013.

 - Integrated CPU, Chip-set, Mass Storage, LAN, Wireless LAN, Card Reader drivers 

 - No Windows Components are removed!

 - Windows Setup Process tweaked, NO NEED FOR KEY!! Activated!!
 
 - Other options (user, locale, network) are visible and user can choose as per need.         

 - OOBE preserved so that account creation is possible 

 - A few registry tweaks (only Safe ones!) are applied automatically.

 - Does not contain IE8 or WMP11 (I find Chrome and MPC-HC more worthy!)

 - To use included themes, copy all themes to WindowsResourcesThemes 

 
This edition can be installed on almost any x86 capable PC. If your computer supports UEFI boot then please disable it in bios. 

To create a bootable flash drive ;-


- Download a tool 'WinSetupFromUSB'

- Mount ISO image using any image mounting software like WinCDEmu

- Create a folder on your hard drive. copy contents of CD to this folder

- Insert a flash drive (at least 1GB)

- Open WinSetupFromUSB

- Tick "Auto Format it With FBinst" option

- Browse and choose the Folder where you copied contents of ISO

- Click Go

And....


Enjoy!!!
